Package com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionListener
    Connection listener interface.
    LocalLoggerListener
    Listener for local logger states.
    LocalLoggerPropertiesChangeListener
    Local logger properties changed listener.
    LoggerReplicationStateListener
    If valid this listener is invoked every time the replication state machine enters a new state.
    ReplicationServerListener
    Listener for the replication server state changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionManager
    Manages a collection of connections and informs listeners when new connections are established.
    FileAttributes
    Utility class for reading and storing a list of FileInfo object and also for converting the list into a string form.
    FileSystemManager
    Manages the reading and writing of logger properties to and from the file system.
    LocalLoggerMonitor
    Manages the state of local loggers.
    LocalRemoteDataMatchChecker
    Helper class that checks if a local directory snapshot is the same or more recent than a remote directory snapshot.
    LocalRemoteDataMatchCheckerFactory
    Factory class that creates LocalRemoteDataMatchChecker instances.
    Logger
    Client side representation of a logger.
    LoggerCoordinates
    A set of properties uniquely identifying a logger.
    LoggerLifecycleStateMachine
    Manages the lifecycle of a logger.
    LoggerManager
    Manages and keeps track of Logger and ReplicationServer instances.
    LoggerReplicationStateMachine
    The replication server state machine.
    LogsReplicationClient
    Entry point for the logs replication client.
    LogsReplicationClientHandler
    Handles the registration and deregistration of the replication client mbean.
    ReplicationServer
    Client side representation of a replication server.
    ReplicationServerCoordinates
    Unique identification information to uniquely identify a replication server.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LogsReplicationClient.ReplicationClientBeanServerScope
    Used to specify whether beans generated by the client are registered with the platform mbean server or a private (non platform) mbean server.
    MountableState
    Mountable state enumeration
    MountedState
    Mounted state enumeration.
    NonMountableReason
    NonMountableReason enumeration.
    ReplicationServerCoordinates.Scope
    Identifies the scope of the replication server these coordinates represent.
